functions.name: k8s_storage_secure_deletion
functions.description: Ensures secure deletion of storage resources.

notes: All functions are based on Kubernetes K8S_STORAGE API.
Ensure proper RBAC permissions are configured.
K8S_STORAGE is a Kubernetes component for storage management.
Configuration, security, monitoring, storage, and compliance are key aspects.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Kubernetes client libraries for API interactions.
